basics.name: Angela Valenzuela
basics.label: Bilingual Web Developer & Designer
basics.summary: Bilingual web developer and designer with multicultural worldview of technology and advocate of accessible web design.

work 1.summary: Manage English and Spanish inbound calls from clients, dealerships, banks, and other departments. Lead meetings with department messages and training. Assist with policies, payments and troubleshoot app login.

work 2.summary: Assist Faculty with grading HTML5 and CSS exercises. Review web development process through research of code, best practices and case studies.

work 3.summary: Track student participation. Act as source of knowledge for students based on past coursework experience. Review UX practices such as personas, heuristic checklists and website design.

work 4.summary: Track student participation. Act as source of knowledge for students based on past coursework experience. Review UX practices such as personas, heuristic checklists and website design.

work 5.summary: Leadership role in which I manage Pediatric Endocrinology office and assist with Doctor interviews and proposals for hire. Work with a small team to start and manage a Fetal Care Program involving multiple hospital specialties.

activities.name: Member of AIGA Student and Phoenix chapter
